name: ITAZURA MADNESS
description:
Welcome to ITAZURA MADNESS, a Cutepop facepunching roguelike about climbing a mysterious tower. Please enjoy yourself, have a good time, and don't make too much of a mess! ^_^

FEATURES!!

  • 4 Playable characters!! And you bet your ass the shopkeeper is playable.
  • 7 bosses, each with their own unique moveset!
  • 60+ weapons: pick and choose from a variety of melee weapons and guns!
  • 100+ items: pick and choose items each floor and assemble your own build to dominate the tower!
  • 10 ascension levels: easy to learn at level 0, hard to master at level 9!
  • GBA Inspired candy coated brutal ass diabetic hypnopompic pastelshit visuals!! What the FUCK!!!!
  • CHAINSAW FLIPPING.

SOUNDTRACK!!

A whole ass 6 track OST, inspired by the mid 2000's videogame aesthetic. Tune in OVER HERE!!!

CREDITS!!

  • ZIZOU!! Art and programming (@Tombdude)
  • PRUTTE!! Bangin' soundtrack (@Prutte94)
  • MADNESS COMBAT belongs to KRINKELS.
  • Cameo items/weapons shamelessly stolen from: LeviRamirez, Stepford, Prosciuttoman, Plufmot, Milkbarjack, Tom Fulp, Strawberryclock, Piconjo, Edmund McMillen... Love you <3

Originally made for MADNESS DAY 2021 on Newgrounds.
